Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.description: The targets take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 20).

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

Effect: Barding of the Zephyr.name: Effect: Barding of the Zephyr

You gain a 30-foot Fly speed for the duration, but any time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Disarm (Success).description:
Granted by a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}

Further attempts to Disarm the item gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and you take a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item. You can end the effect by Interacting to change your grip on the item; otherwise, it lasts as long as you hold the item.

In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Protective Barrier.name: Effect: Protective Barrier
Effect: Protective Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.vehicles.Actor.bMgQftCEiSqa1pTk]{Vonthos's Golden Bridge}

While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. The pilot is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat. The pilot also gains resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Effect: Raise a Shield.name: Effect: Raise a Shield
Effect: Raise a Shield.description: You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to cold. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to electricity. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to sonic. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise).name: Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise)
Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise).description: Speak “clarity” to grant all affected a +2 status bonus to their next Will save for 1 minute.

Effect: Sea Touch Elixir (Greater).name: Effect: Sea Touch Elixir (Greater)
Effect: Sea Touch Elixir (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.i4D4B7tpYv9vMvQY]{Sea Touch Elixir (Greater)}

Effect: Searing Blade (Greater).name: Effect: Searing Blade (Greater)
Effect: Searing Blade (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pvxRcuBexbFawjCg]{Searing Blade (Greater)}

All weapon and unarmed attacks by you and your allies within the area gain the effect of the flaming property rune.

Effect: Shimmering Dust.name: Effect: Shimmering Dust
Effect: Shimmering Dust.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ZiD7kDxU4KEkO6XH]{Shimmering Dust}

The creature sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius and takes a –2 circumstance penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Shining Ammunition.name: Effect: Shining Ammunition
Effect: Shining Ammunition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NI7twU2G6UCDmvCO]{Shining Ammunition}

The ammunition sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 10 minutes. If it hits a target, it sticks, causing the target to shed light in the same radius. A creature can remove the ammunition with an Interact action, but the ammunition itself continues to glow for the rest of the duration or until destroyed.

Effect: Shining Symbol.name: Effect: Shining Symbol
Effect: Shining Symbol.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Major)}

Creatures in the light receive a status penalty to Deception and Stealth checks.

Effect: Shining Symbol Weakness.name: Effect: Shining Symbol Weakness
Effect: Shining Symbol Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Major)}

Your enemies gain weakness to spirit damage.

Effect: Shrinking Potion.name: Effect: Shrinking Potion
Effect: Shrinking Potion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FqbDpztscJfM4XMe]{Shrinking Potion}

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of the shrink spell to make you and all your gear smaller.

Effect: Shrinking Potion (Greater).name: Effect: Shrinking Potion (Greater)
Effect: Shrinking Potion (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5xsfj30uXMKINxnk]{Shrinking Potion (Greater)}

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of a 4th-rank shrink spell to make you and all your gear smaller. In addition, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while shrunken.

Effect: Silver Salve.name: Effect: Silver Salve
Effect: Silver Salve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8fbsKEEbZ0CfBMIr]{Silver Salve}

The weapon or ammunition counts as silver instead of its normal material (such as cold iron) for any physical damage it deals.

Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6odVabL0WL2H89Ic]{Sixfingers Elixir (Greater)}

Auomatically applied effects:

  • +2 to Reflex DCs against Disarm

  • +2 to Reflex DCs against Disarm

  • +2 to Reflex DCs against Disarm

Effect: Slime Whip.name: Effect: Slime Whip
Effect: Slime Whip.description: For 1 round, the slime whip deals acid damage rather than slashing damage. If the attack deals persistent damage, the persistent damage is also acid damage instead of its usual type.

Effect: Sneaky Key.name: Effect: Sneaky Key
Effect: Sneaky Key.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1v1OK06JxdXn6MP4]{Sneaky Key}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.description:
While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: The damage cannot currently be made to automatically increase as the damage dice increase.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.description:
You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.

Effect: Spined Shield Spines.name: Effect: Spined Shield Spines
Effect: Spined Shield Spines.description: When you use the Shield Block reaction with this shield, the spines take the damage before the shield itself does. When the shield would take damage (after applying Hardness), one spine snaps off per 6 damage, reducing the damage by 6.

Effect: Staff of Illumination.name: Effect: Staff of Illumination
Effect: Staff of Illumination.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8No84rsBOCVCkXJK]{Staff of Illumination}

The gem at the top of the staff glows as a torch, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet).

Effect: Storm Chair.name: Effect: Storm Chair
Effect: Storm Chair.description: For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take @Damage[2d6[electricity]] damage each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

Effect: Stormbreaker Fulu.name: Effect: Stormbreaker Fulu
Effect: Stormbreaker Fulu.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NQuE19X1YMWjiWHl]{Stormbreaker Fulu}

You gain resistance 15 to cold, electricity, and sonic damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Swift Block Cabochon.name: Effect: Swift Block Cabochon
Effect: Swift Block Cabochon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4tnPWyApPZP1P1yO]{Swift Block Cabochon}

Increase the shield's Hardness by 5 against the triggering attack.

Effect: Throne Card.name: Effect: Throne Card
Effect: Throne Card.description: Granted by Throne from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Gyi4IVrAVJRPJF2s]{Deck of Many Things}

Effect: Topology Protoplasm.name: Effect: Topology Protoplasm
Effect: Topology Protoplasm.description: In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor.name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor
Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.lN3Fn9AuNcKbXucJ]{Trinity Geode}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 1 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5W86t6I92rRNSmwR]{Trinity Geode (Greater)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 3 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.2sr23ZSpplB1oBHd]{Trinity Geode (Major)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon.name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon
Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.lN3Fn9AuNcKbXucJ]{Trinity Geode}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5W86t6I92rRNSmwR]{Trinity Geode (Greater)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major).name: Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major)
Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.2sr23ZSpplB1oBHd]{Trinity Geode (Major)}

After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Vapor Sphere.name: Effect: Vapor Sphere
Effect: Vapor Sphere.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.HBlUlkSlIQ0NQA9N]{Vapor Sphere}

You gain resistance 25 to physical damage and are immune to precision damage.

Effect: Winged Sandals.name: Effect: Winged Sandals
Effect: Winged Sandals.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aKoMqPDmVzPI7Q20]{Winged Sandals}

The wings grow in size and propel you through the air, granting you a fly Speed of 30 feet.
